title: LG brand Whoo sets precedent for K beauty brands as it surpasses 2 trillion won mark - Global Cosmetics News
text: TRENDING: Posted by Louise Prance-Miles | Jan 3, 2019 | Asia & Australasia, Finance | LG-owned brand Whoo has surpassed 2 trillion won in sales, a landmark revenue achievement for a K beauty brand, according to a report by Pulse News. At 40 percent higher than the company’s 1.42 trillion won revenue in 2017, it highlights the ongoing consumer demand for ‘Made in Korea’ products.
